definitions: A flat dish, typically circular, from which food is eaten or served.
A thin, flat piece of metal or other hard material, typically square or rectangular, used for various purposes.
A sheet of glass or metal coated with a light-sensitive emulsion, used in a camera to take a photograph, or in printing.
A home plate in baseball or a base in other sports.
A covering of metal or other hard material to protect a surface.
examples: She put the plate on the table.
The car has a personalized number plate.
The armour plate protected the tank.
